Package rpc.util

Class Summary
Assert Utility class that defines static assertion methods.
CausalModelUtil Utility class that defines methods used in the causal model generator and mapping for consistent naming conventions of variables and vertices.
DesignUtil Utility class that provides methods to compare, standardize, and build paths and units.
LogUtil Utility class used to call static methods to initialize the logging system.
PrologUtil Utility class that provides auxiliary methods dealing with and communicating with Prolog.
PythonUtil Utility class that provides methods to translate Python objects to Java.
RHandler Implementation of a simple handler for the StatisticEngine for R.
SchemaUtil Utility class that provides methods about the schema.
TimeStampLayout Replacement for Log4J's standard pattern layout utility.
UnitUtil Utility class that provides methods to process and retrieve units.
